item.description:
Ok, Columbus day weekend is a big day! Three major activities going on:

Skidad's are having a 21+ social event. With band outside in yard on the afternoon of Saturday October 6th Rt 16 near Attitash Oct 6th.

Wedeln Yard sale down on rt 16 near the cathedral ledge scenic overlook. Also during the day Saturday October 6th.

Work weekend for "key" holders - cleaning and organizing for the upcoming ski and snowboard season. Please plan to come up and do a bit of painting, repairs, and cleaning. Elbo grease welcome!

Please RSVP, if you're attending, non "key" holders are not expected to do "work" but help is welcome. instead come up and do some mountain biking or hiking!
item.name: Columbus Day Weekend! Up at the house!
